Classes/HeroModifier.html#/s:4Hero0A8Mod.abstract: Force Hero to not create any snapshot when animating this view.

Classes/HeroModifier.html#/s:4Hero0A8Mod.abstract: Force the view to animate.

Classes/HeroModifier.html#/s:4Hero0A8Mod.name: useScaleBasedSizeChange
Classes/HeroModifier.html#/s:4Hero0A8Mod.abstract: Force Hero use scale based size animation. This will convert all .size modifier into .scale modifier.

Classes/HeroModifier.html#/s:4Hero0A8Mod.abstract: Set the masksToBounds for the view to animate from/to.

Classes/HeroModifier.html#/s:4Hero0A8Mod.abstract: Create an overlay on the animating view.

Classes/HeroModifier.html#/s:4Hero0A8Mod.name: duration(_:)
Classes/HeroModifier.html#/s:4Hero0A8Mod.abstract: Sets the duration of the animation for a given view. If not used, Hero will use determine the duration based on the distance and size changes.

Classes/HeroModifier.html#/s:4Hero0A8Mod.name: durationMatchLongest
Classes/HeroModifier.html#/s:4Hero0A8Mod.abstract: Sets the duration of the animation for a given view to match the longest animation of the transition.

Classes/HeroModifier.html#/s:4Hero0A8Mod.name: delay(_:)
Classes/HeroModifier.html#/s:4Hero0A8Mod.abstract: Sets the delay of the animation for a given view.

Classes/HeroModifier.html#/s:4Hero0A8Mod.name: timingFunction(_:)
Classes/HeroModifier.html#/s:4Hero0A8Mod.abstract: Sets the timing function of the animation for a given view. If not used, Hero will use determine the timing function based on whether or not the view is entering or exiting the screen.

Classes/HeroModifier.html#/s:4Hero0A8Mod.name: spring(stiffness:damping:)
Classes/HeroModifier.html#/s:4Hero0A8Mod.abstract: (iOS 9+) Use spring animation with custom stiffness & damping. The duration will be automatically calculated. Will be ignored if arc, timingFunction, or duration is set.

Classes/HeroModifier.html#/s:4Hero0A8Mod.name: source(heroID:)
Classes/HeroModifier.html#/s:4Hero0A8Mod.abstract: Transition from/to the state of the view with matching heroID

Classes/HeroModifier.html#/s:4Hero0A8Mod.name: arc
Classes/HeroModifier.html#/s:4Hero0A8Mod.abstract: Works in combination with position modifier to apply a natural curve when moving to the destination.

Classes/HeroModifier.html#/s:4Hero0A8Mod.name: arc(intensity:)
Classes/HeroModifier.html#/s:4Hero0A8Mod.abstract: Works in combination with position modifier to apply a natural curve when moving to the destination.

Classes/HeroModifier.html#/s:4Hero0A8Mod.abstract: Cascade applys increasing delay modifiers to subviews
